name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Python Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing robust, high-performance applications utilizing **Python**, **Django**, and cloud technologies such as **AWS** and **Azure**. My technical expertise includes CI/CD automation, containerization using **Docker**, and orchestration with **Kubernetes**, complemented by hands-on experience in infrastructure as code practices with **Terraform**, **CDK**, and **CloudFormation**. I am proficient in relational and schema-less databases, as well as modern backend paradigms including **GraphQL** and **gRPC**. 
Moreover, I have a proven track record of leading enterprise-level projects that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS while integrating advanced features for scalability and security. My adaptable nature enables me to seamlessly work in cross-functional teams and deliver solutions that drive business success.
